text: Wang Hongbing (born 26 November 1962) is a Chinese rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of China Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in rowing Category:Rowers at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Rowers at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games
title: Wang Hongbing
